text: Yakhana taderake bala haya, allaha ya pathiyechena ta mene na'o, takhana tara bale, amara mani ya amadera prati abartina hayeche. Seti chara sabaguloke tara asbikara kare. Athaca e granthati satya ebam satyayana kare ai granthera ya tadera kache rayeche. Bale dina, tabe tomara itipurbe payagambaradera hatya karate kena yadi tomara bisbasi chile
